name: Klean Kinja
description: Cleans up the interface of all Kinja sites to be easier to read.
additional_info:
Makes the following changes to clean up all Kinja sites:
- Removes left sidebar
- Centers content, including articles and headers
- Increases maximum width of text, comments, etc. to match the width of the article title and header image
- Removes the "hey look we have unrelated videos you can watch!" widgets in the middle of articles
- Removes the "share bar" on the bottom of the screen.
